comments.raw_text: Tracking for CSS4 Images. Webkit has already begun implementation. http://trac.webkit.org/changeset/100535

comments.raw_text:
Is there a bug open specifically for image-set()? [1]

[1] https://drafts.csswg.org/css-images-3/#image-set-notation
comments.author: nicolas@hoizey.com
comments.text:
Is there a bug open specifically for image-set()? [1]

[1] https://drafts.csswg.org/css-images-3/#image-set-notation
comments.creator: nicolas@hoizey.com

comments.raw_text:
(In reply to Nicolas Hoizey from comment #1)
> Is there a bug open specifically for image-set()? [1]
> 
> [1] https://drafts.csswg.org/css-images-3/#image-set-notation

Yes, bug 1107646. Though note that https://github.com/w3c/csswg-drafts/issues/1148 is asking to move it to css-images-4 due to missing implementations.

Sebastian
comments.author: sebastianzartner@gmail.com
